name: FUNishment
description:
Have "fun" with your friends in this mobile online party game. Choose from a broad range of predefined and self-created answers to answer our "interesting" and "challenging" questions and become the edgiest person in the room. If not, be prepared to accept your punishment for beeing a lame normie.

Team

  • Alexander Lercher
  • Andreas Tscheinig
  • Christof Bachmann
  • Christoph Wedenig
  • Peter Waysocher
  • Sarah Wachter
  • Veit Frick

Disclaimer: Developed during the 48 hours of the 9th Klagenfurt GameJam . The theme was "Punishment", the applied diversifier were "Gamebert", "Wait, something changed", and "Groundhog Day".
